name: @InoReader: Tweaks & Fixups
description: Fixups and tweaks for InoReader (RSS Feed Reader). Will add more css rules as needed.
additional_info: versions: 1.00: link coloring and visitation. 1.01: added: highlighting hovered/active links, styling collapsed articles, styling up/down buttons. 1.02: fixing/adjustment of article bar (remove 'dead' zone in the expander UI). 1.03: legibility 1.03: highlight current viewing mode and folder. 1.04: highlight current selected tree node and sub-node. 1.05: hack: added padding to bottom of tree so popup of lower tree-items are visible when accessed. 1.06: padding adjustment for .article_header_text so the layout/spacing is closer to original site (2013-07-02). 1.07: numerous changes to selectors; broad changes to rules related to article padding/alignment to make it more similar to site style. 1.08: shrink inoreader logo; added visitation indication line under the tiny link on article bars; lime for unvisited, purple for visited (2013-07-07). 1.09: minor adjustment to pseudo-class of .header_button child anchor. 1.10: fix article link visitation indictor
